pr_title: Update minimum wire compat version to 4.1

timeline.message: Update minimum wire compat version to 4.1

timeline.author: seut
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -332,14 +332,21 @@ public XContentBuilder toXContent(XContentBuilder builder, Params params) throws } /** - * Returns the minimum compatible version based on the current - * version. Ie a node needs to have at least the return version in order - * to communicate with a node running the current version. The returned version - * is in most of the cases the smallest major version release unless the current version - * is a beta or RC release then the version itself is returned. + * The minimum version other nodes need to have to communicate with this node. + * + * We support rolling upgrades between successive versions. + * So: + * + * 
+     *  current | min support
+     *      4.1 |         4.0
+     *      4.2 |         4.1
+     *      ...
+     *      5.0 |         4.x where x is the last within 4.
+     *
*/ public Version minimumCompatibilityVersion() { - return V_4_0_0; + return V_4_1_1;

replies.bodyText: 4.1.0 never moved to the stable channels.  But can  also change it
replies.author: mfussenegger

replies.bodyText: I'd suggest to either use 4.1.0 (I think even if never was stable it will be supported) or add a short comment to avoid confusion ;-)
replies.author: seut

replies.bodyText: Changed it to 4.1.0, in crate-qa the rolling upgrade tests start from there.
replies.author: mfussenegger
